channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: You are how you act
item.description:
We invoke Franklin when we need accountability: Show me what you’ve done. Rousseau invites endless introspection. Franklin invites progress.

Read more

item.title: Rust cross-platform GPUI components
item.description:
GPUI Component UI components for building fantastic desktop applications using GPUI. GPUI Component has a WebView element based on Wry. Development We have a gallery of applications built with GPUI Component.

Read more

item.title: Don't forget these tags to make HTML work like you expect
item.description: doctype html>

item.title: Microsoft needs to open up more about its OpenAI dealings
Artifact (YC W25) is hiring engineers in NYC to build modern ECAD
item.description:
Artifact is a CAD tool to collaboratively design electrical systems for complex hardware projects. People are using Artifact to design their supersonic jets, reusable satellites, marine robots, and autonomous drones. Learn more here: https://www.

Read more

item.title: WorldGrow: Generating Infinite 3D World
item.description:
WorldGrow: Generating Infinite 3D World Sikuang Li1*, Chen Yang2*, Jiemin Fang2✉, Taoran Yi3, Jia Lu3, Jiazhong Cen1, Lingxi Xie2, Wei Shen1, Qi Tian2✉ 1Shanghai Jiao Tong University 2Huawei 3Huazhong University of Science and Technology *Equal contribution ✉Corresponding author We propose WorldGrow — a generative method which creates infinite EXPLICIT 3D worlds, an alternative to the extensible, realistic, interactive world simulator. Overview WorldGrow is a hierarchical framework for infinite (open-ended) 3D world generation. Requirements (placeholder) Installation (placeholder) Visualization (placeholder) Results Gallery: diverse generated scenes at multiple scales.

Read more

item.title: What Happened to Running What You Wanted on Your Own Machine?
item.description:
Today, that freedom is dying. There are always security risks when running code from untrusted sources. It was just how computers were.

Read more

item.title: Canada Set to Side with China on EVs
item.description:
We publish China scoops you won't find anywhere else. A weekly curated reading list on China from Andrew Peaple. Includes images from Depositphotos.
